author: Megan Armstrong
title: Joe Burrow Urges People to Follow Safety Guidelines Amid COVID-19 Pandemic
description: Heisman Trophy winner Joe Burrow is expected to go No. 1 overall in next month's  NFL  draft to the Cincinnati Bengals, and the 23-year-old former LSU quarterback is already taking a leadership role in his home state during the coronavirus pandemic...
content:
Danny Karnik/Associated Press
